items.#text: Scan your purchase yourself and pay directly in the app. No queueing and without putting your purchase on the belt.

items.text: Enter a participating Penny store, start shopping and hold the barcode of an article in front of the camera.

items.#text: Please accept the terms of use and take note of the privacy policy.
items.text: Please accept the [terms](snabble://terms.html) of use and take note of the [privacy](snabble://privacy.html) policy.
items.#text: Es gelten die Nutzungsbedingungen. Bitte beachte unsere Hinweise zum Datenschutz.
